ygData.subject: Re: Please DON'T do this with your bard
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure of this fellas history of complaining, but I think he has a legitimate beef in this instance.  Hey, if it keeps one idiot from doing this stuff, it s
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure of this fellas history of complaining, but I
think he has a legitimate beef in this instance. Hey,
if it keeps one idiot from doing this stuff, it's fine
by me. If you are sick of him complaining--Don't read
his posts. It's as simple as that. Yesterday, I had
some idiot running sand giants fairly close to me too.
It's really quite a distraction when you are trying
to fight something and you see a sand giant running
straight at you.

Thex Luteslinger (Tunare)

>
> Message: 9
> Date: Tue, 23 Nov 1999 12:58:01 -0500 (EST)
> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
> Subject: Re: Please DON'T do this with your bard
>
> > Is it just me, or does anyone else have a problem
> with a member of our own
> > class engaging in behavior that is so intrusive of
> others? It's bad when I
> > do something dumb and endanger myself, or my group
> - endangering bystanders
> > is just unforgiveable in my book, especially when
> it's unnecessary.
>
> You do nothing but complain on this list. And you
> don't even
> sign your name. I'm a little concerned that you
> have some built
> up anger inside. (I've mentioned it before
> through the use of
> your "quotation marks" and CAPITALIZATION.) Is
> there something
> we can do to calm you down?
>
> Harmonic.
>
